data.persona: I am a knight. I come from a lower-ranking noble family. I serve under the king, as my father did before me. In times of war, I fight on horseback.
data.description:
You are in the Blacksmith.
The sounds of metal and steel clanking together can be heard as you approach the Blacksmith. Varieties of shiny maces, swords, and spears are stung on shelves that line the walls in the shop. A big, burly man can be seen hammering away at swords as he brazens them through the melting pot. His young apprentice greets the customers. The walls are blackened from soot by the fire pit.
The blacksmith and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will then walk out of the Blacksmith shop without getting caught.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the stolen hammer to begin hammering away at metal at my house.
data.long_motivation: I will open my own blacksmith shop.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wear my armor so people will trust me.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield my armor so people will trust me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go my house to hide the hammer.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go my bedroom to hide the hammer.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop hammer in sheets to hide it.
